Text.Page:
Drained? His blood was drained?

Okay, I've got soldiers heading out that way. Rendezvous with them in the Twisted Plains. Report to {@LinkCreature:216#1012#Ludin}.

Paka sent you? Yeah, okay. Good. See that wall of folks over there? They're killing anyone who gets nearby and we can't get through to the village.

See what you can do to help.
